description: Michael Powell wrote about New York politics and government for The New York Times from 2011 to 2014 in a weekly column.
title: New York
title_page: New York - The New York Times
text:
Image
Veteran Wages a New Fight: For His Home
A man who fought in Vietnam and then delivered mail for decades should have been able to retire safely; he owned a house in Queens with a mortgage all but paid off. That latter fact, however, laid him low.
